name: Moonstrips (Onion-Poppy) Matzo Brei
description: Passover always puts me in a Moonstrips frame of mind. What are Moonstrips? They're onion and poppy-flavored matzos made by Streit's and they are the tastiest matzos ever. They don't make a kosher for Passover version, but this matzo brei...

recipeInstructions.text: Break the matzos and soak in boiling water for 15 minutes. Drain and squeeze dry.
Add the eggs and salt to taste.

Taking spoonfuls of batter at a time, fry in the butter or chicken fat, patting the center down a bit. If you want larger matzo pancakes, just add more batter each time. Fry until golden brown on one side, then turn and fry on the other.
